header.title: Belgian Online Investing Platforms
header.description: Compare investment platforms and trading costs across Belgium's most popular online brokers. Discover which platform offers the best fees for your investment strategy—whether you're trading ETFs, individual stocks, or bonds. Make data-driven decisions to optimize your trading costs.

table.howToReadDescription: Each column represents a different investment amount (tier). The fees shown are the total annual costs to execute one transaction at that amount. Choose your typical investment size to find the most cost-effective broker for your strategy.
table.amountTooltip: Fees for a single transaction of €{{amount}}. Select this tier if you typically invest amounts around this level.

analysis.title: Financial Analysis
analysis.preparingSubtitle: Claude is analyzing the comparison data, please wait
analysis.incomplete: Analysis data is incomplete. Please try reloading.
analysis.costForInvestorTypes: Cost comparison for different investor types
analysis.disclaimerDefault: Fee information based on publicly available data and may change. Always verify current rates with brokers directly before making investment decisions.
analysis.detailedComparison: Detailed comparison of investment platform fees

news.noNewsAvailable: No news available at the moment
news.emptyMessage: No news items available at the moment • Check back soon for the latest market updates
news.noMatch: No news items match your selected brokers. Try selecting different brokers to see more news.
news.autoScraped: News items are automatically scraped and updated. Check back soon for updates.
news.clickToRead: News items are automatically scraped and updated. Click to read full story.

newsroom.title: Market Newsroom
newsroom.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest insights from Belgian brokers
newsroom.noNewsHint: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.

personas.title: Investor Persona Comparison
personas.subtitle: Total Cost of Ownership analysis for different investor profiles on Euronext Brussels

chatbot.title: MarketMind
chatbot.subtitle: AI Investment Advisor
chatbot.welcome: Welcome to your AI-powered investment advisor! I provide in-depth fee analysis and cost optimization strategies across Belgium's leading brokers: ING Self Invest, Bolero, ReBel, Degiro, and Keytrade. Get transparent insights into trading costs, custody fees, hidden charges, and personalized recommendations. Ask me anything to find the perfect broker for your investment goals.
chatbot.chip1: What are the cheapest ETF brokers?
chatbot.fallback: Thank you for your question about "{{question}}". I'm currently connecting to the analysis engine. In the meantime, you can explore the Comparison Tables and Financial Analysis tabs for detailed broker fee data.
